mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, board_cafe_comment.regdate, profile,com_likecount FROM board_cafe_comment INNER JOIN exhibition_users ON board_cafe_comment.writer=exhibition_users.id WHERE ref_group=#{seq} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment_like WHERE seq=#{ref_group} AND id=#{id} AND num=#{num}
